device.name: Pulse/Triangle Voltage Controlled Oscillator
device.description: A wide range, temperature-compensated voltage controlled ocsillator featuring 1 volt per octave exponential response. Pulse and triangle waveform output.

device.name: MultiWave Voltage Controlled Oscillator
device.description: A wide range, temperature-compensated voltage controlled ocsillator featuring 1 volt per octave exponential response. Pulse, triangle, and sine waveform output.

device.name: Economy Voltage Controlled Oscillator
device.description: A low-cost, wide range, temperature-compensated voltage controlled ocsillator featuring 1 volt per octave exponential response. Square wave output.

device.name: State Variable Filter
device.description: State varible filter with 12dB cutoff slope. Features simultaneous high pass, bandpass, and low pass output, and voltage controlled resonance.

device.name: Low Pass Filter
device.description: Voltage controlled low pass filter with 24dB cutoff slope. Features simultaneous high pass, bandpass, and low pass output, and full voltage control of resonance.
